mapper.sql: goodsid, typeid, goodsname, goodsimp, vipprice, goodsprice, goodsflag, goodscount, commentid
mapper.insert:
insert into goods
goodsid,
typeid,
goodsname,
goodsimp,
vipprice,
goodsprice,
goodsflag,
goodscount,
commentid,
#{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsimp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vipprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update goods
typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsimp = #{goodsimp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vipprice = #{vipprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsprice = #{goodsprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsflag = #{goodsflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodscount = #{goodscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commentid = #{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update goods set typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsimp = #{goodsimp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vipprice = #{vipprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsprice = #{goodsprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsflag = #{goodsflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodscount = #{goodscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentid = #{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select g.goodsid,t.typename,g.goodsname,g.goodsimp,g.vipprice,g.goodsprice,g.goodsflag,g.goodscount,c.txt from goods g inner join goodstype t on g.typeid=t.typeid inner join `comment` c on g.commentid=c.commentid
